text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Your letter's safe with me! It'll be in the neighboring district in no time! Safely, speedily!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'm baaack! And all my deliveries are dooone!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Right, then let's finish up the deliveries and errands in the same direction! We'll have 17 requests to turn it at once!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I'll take the far away ones! Can you two take the closer by ones?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Fununununuuu～～～!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That box looks heavy, Turbo…!! Want me to carry it?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: … Nooo probs! I know a shortcut and running is faster! The weight just… ehehe… makes this more fun!!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, that's great. I'll leave you to it then! See ya later～!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …… Close the valve… and hope this works…! Heck yeah, washer fixed!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: A superb display of skill, Taishin. Nice work.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Well, I am a mechanical engineer. And it's thanks to your advice that I could increase its power, Hayahide.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: That technical book I borrowed from the workshop certainly came in handy. Having an actual machine for reference taught me a lot as well.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I hope to contribute to the airplane research with the knowle—

text_block_list.name: Eatery Employee
text_block_list.text: Airplane research? Oh, you're the kids I saw with the girl from that workshop earlier.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Correct. We're helping out with her research.

text_block_list.name: Eatery Employee
text_block_list.text: Huh? Aahahaha! Come now, you can't take that fantasy seriously! How do you intend to fly a lump of iron!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But, she told us she has seen an iron airplane fly herself.

text_block_list.name: Eatery Employee
text_block_list.text: Ah, the prototype of her predecessor in the workshop, eh? It did look like it could maybe fly a little back then, but it's been nothing but failures after that.

text_block_list.name: Eatery Employee
text_block_list.text: So her predecessor eventually got frustrated and retired. I hope for her own sake the new girl can let it rest soon too.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Wha……?

text_block_list.name: Eatery Employee
text_block_list.text: We got trains, boats, cars… no one needs airplanes. She's plenty smart, so why doesn't she just get a job at a vehicle company or something?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ……Your advice is appreciated. I think we will excuse ourselves here.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: The heck was that tone for? Telling people to find a different job? Who does she think she is?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: That person must be concerned in her own way. Flight experiments are risky, and seeing her push herself to the point of collapse, I'm sure many would be concerned.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: And concern gives her the right to spout that crap!? Casually telling her to just give up…! …Pisses me off!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: There actually must be many difficulties in having an iron plane fly. Out of concern, she recommends a path with much less frustrations.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: And I'm saying it's none of her business!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But our researcher has not given up. I believe she can see a path to success. In other words, to make others understand―

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: … We have to show them. That it can be done. The possibility.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Get them back by showing an iron plane fly…!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ―Exactly. That is what I intend as well. Who would listen to such a warning anyway.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: …… Oh look, you were pretty ticked off yourself, huh?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Of course I was. —Either way, I believe we're done gathering funds for now.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: It's time for us to start helping with the research in earnest. Can we stop by the workshop first? I'd like to borrow a few things for research.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Huff… huff… Heyas—! I gots a brand new machine here to replace your old one—!

text_block_list.name: Workshop Seamstress
text_block_list.text: Thanks! …Huh, you carried it yourself!? It must be plenty heavy, you didn't use a truck?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo's faster than trucks! So, where do I put it down?

text_block_list.name: Workshop Seamstress
text_block_list.text: Woaah～, it's so helpful that you can carry it! Could you leave it over there then?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Hello! I left the foodstuffs you ordered in the back, could you check them over, please?

text_block_list.name: Eatery Employee
text_block_list.text: Sure thing… wait, all 12 boxes!? You got them all done? I imagine it took ya at least 3 trips.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Huh? I just carried them all at once?

text_block_list.name: Eatery Employee
text_block_list.text: My word! You must have some great balance, kid!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Hi hi! Thanks for entrusting me with your packages!! I'm done with all the deliveriieess!

text_block_list.name: Client Of Delivery Requests
text_block_list.text: Huh, already!? All the different places? Even the house at the foot of the mountain?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! I just skip along the rooftops like whoosh! If you have any other packages I can deliver them too.

text_block_list.name: Client Of Delivery Requests
text_block_list.text: No, I'm good for now. But you've certainly got a lot of energy. What makes you go that hard?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Actually, we're raising money for research! On iron planes!!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Turbo's friends are helping to build a new plane! Isn't that great?!

text_block_list.name: Client Of Delivery Requests
text_block_list.text: An airplane!? You're building something that dangerous? Oh I wouldn't! You'll get more than hurt when it crashes!

text_block_list.name: Client Of Delivery Requests
text_block_list.text: There was a failed experiment with a prototype airplane before too. And I heard that one of the two researchers quit after that.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Quit…? You mean the previous researcher?

text_block_list.name: Client Of Delivery Requests
text_block_list.text: Yeah. He must've gotten so scared that he couldn't stand to look at planes anymore… The old wreck's still out there, untouched and weathered.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Eeeeeeeh!? They just left it there!?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: ―This adjustment could take some time…… Sorry, but you'll have to wait a while.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Sure, I don't mind. I'm reading through old research so take your time.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: …… I see, the iron couldn't stand up to the increase in internal pressure… So they changed material for the next one. … Oh, here's the formula.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: They've redone their output calculations many times to find the materials they needed. And there are detailed notes regarding the problems found in tests flights…!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: —They never stopped believing. That it would fly every time they squashed a problem. And they did in fact come within a hair's breadth of crossing the mountains!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: That's how far they had come! … We cannot let this predecessor's hard work be in vain.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: This airframe is the culmination of its previous researcher's efforts―!
